caption: Good beer good service and good food

My burger was good. Environment was nice. I really enjoyed the buffalo cauliflower bites. My friends enjoyed their beers. The wait was short for the table and they accommodated us while we waited. Staff was extremely attentive and friendly.

A great place to eat downtown. Their pizza is the perfect size for lunch. I would eat here more but their minimum order fee of $12 for pickup makes it inconvenient for me to order as none of the meals I want are that much
My mom's on town visiting and we decided to take her downtown and she picked this place and we were so pleased with the service Jonathan was the best server ever! And the food was amazing 😊
Food was amazing. Our server Jonathan was excellent, friendly, and knowledgeable. Will definitely return.
Loved the atmosphere here but Jonathan our server was amazing and I want to come back just for him!
Jonathan was an incredible server!  Gourmet service and a delicious burger.

Super nice place. Great food. Had Tori as our waitress who suggested to get her own invented little vinny flatbread which was really good. Also ordered some tacos that were a tiny bit dry and a ruben that Tori kindly split onto two plates …

Dude today was our first day and our waiter Jonathan was awesome ! He memorized our order without writing Anything down  and not to mention he was such a VIBE ! he knew the menu from front to back down to the beers and sauces lol 😂 what a good first impression ! We will def be back ! Can’t wait to try  everything 🤩🤩
Came in today for drinks and some appetizers. Our server Jonathan was such a nice guy with the best personality. Very personable and gave amazing service! Food was delicious as well as the drinks.
Great beer good food and GREAT Service
Had the best server and the food and beer is surprisingly good for being in a community like this! Thank you for the great service and great food/beverages!
Great beer in a great town. Plenty of draft beers available. Namaste Lavender is a very light and tasteful beer to have on a afternoon. Military Discount Available!
Awesome it has a nice waiter named Jonathan. Fresh ingredients love the Chicken tinga taco's . nice place If you are thinking to go there You should.
Great service and the food was delicious! Jonathan served us well and we saw him working hard taking care of his customers. We will back again soon.  thank you  Christian
Jonathan was great. Food was great. Beer even better.

JONATHAN. wicked awesome server. Definitely added to the experience. He knew everything on the menu and was quick with recommending some awesome brews and chews. The jalapeño poppers man. So good. Try the sours and the porter. Both are awesome. He is the reason I am back !
On my first visit, Jonathan was a great server, was very welcoming! Great beer, great food too. Would recommend this place to anyone for a good bite to eat and something good to drink!
Worst place ever. Food is disgusting and the management is ridiculous. This place may as well be ran by children

In void Queen best am home no home lead day of it is so fun to me know me an try English role am cute zero vote Paul database game am okay give go home all Jack an it on is Ben end vs meets Xinjiang once next am sorry am sorry am cool Virginia MX
Enjoyed our time overall  Great and very friendly staff. Server was helpful! Food is good, nothing special.
Good food and even better beer

Lake Gaston Brewing was an awesome place in downtown Fayetteville. After a long day of work, did a search for local microbreweries in the area, and this place came up on Google Maps with 3.5 stars. I was skeptical but decided to give it a …
First visit. Great service and atmosphere
Excellent  people, food, service and craft beers. Definitely a go to Brewery when I'm in town!
Great burgers and beer. Highly recommend the lavender beer, my wife proclaims it to be the the best ever made!
Beer is good, Food is good, the view is good.
Jonathan was an amazing server and suggested some delicious craft beers for me to try and they were so good!! Totally would recommend for food and beer!
Great restaurant! Our server Jonathan was the sweetest!!
Jordan is a dope 10/10 server. Try the Namaste Ale in all its award winning glory. 🇺🇸
the girl from Twilight was our server and she’s the BEST I think her name was Tori.  10/10  will be returning probably tomorrow...

This is a solid brewery in the heart of Downtown Fayetteville! Clean and welcoming atmosphere with service to match. You definitely have to try out their Namaste Lavender Ale! A delightful floral beer that I would not have imagined. Their …

Had a good night at Gaston brewing co. Tori our server was fantastic very attentive and suggestive of the best appetizers on the menu, she checked on us continuously. I will definitely be visiting Gaston Brewing Co. again
The bartender Jennette was amazing best one I ever had!!!!!!
Jonathan provided excellent and friendly service, we had lunch and sampled a few craft beers.  Food was tasty and went home with a growler of the Gold Digger Belgian Tripel!

My wife and I were traveling home and decided to stop for the night in Fayetteville, NC. Being big brewery fans, we stopped into Gaston. Where can I start with this 5 Star Rating?  Jennette, the bartender was just absolutely perfect in …

We stopped in on the way back from Raven Rock State Park. We were starving and in need of some good beer, and Gaston Brewing Company did not disappoint! Tori was our server. She was super attentive! We will be back next time we come through this area!
Try the Gold Digger or the Namaste Lavender Ale.
Fun stop on our way to DC. Great service. Good food and beer in a neat location.

I went here last night with a few friends it was the worst experience I've ever had at a restaurant. We sat inside with a female server, she started the night off good when there were just two of us. When the rest of my party came it was …
We had the pleasure of having Jonathan as a waiter. He was very polite, respectful, and on point! We never had an empty drink during our time here. Thank you for a great experience!!
Jonathan was the best server, so polite and food was amazing! Thanks Jonathan!
First time coming here , Jonathan our server was amazing! And the food is awesome!!
Great place to hang out with friends and have a drink. Jonathan was a great server! Great environment!
Jonathan was a great server! The food and drinks were delicious! Recommend this place for all of your brunch needs!
Great time!
Jonathan was excellent! Super sweet with great service
Great environment and good selection of beer on tap
Great craft beers, excellent service and tasty burgers with fresh ingredients. Highly recommend if you're in the downtown Fayetteville area and looking for food and drinks.
Jonathan was our server and he was so attentive and kind! He made our day and the beer was delicious. Would definitely come back!
Amazing sour beer and sweet potato fries. Jonathon was great. He let me try a few different beers and was quick to be of service with anything we needed.
Always a great place to kick back on a weekend and great service from Jonathan!
Johnathan was awesome, always great beer and food
Had dinner here on Saturday. Had Tori and a waitress and she was amazing!! Food 5/5, server: 6/5!
Great beer, friendly staff, overall great experience! Our server, Jonathan, was awesome!
Came here with my husky puppy and sat on the patio. Super dog friendly! Johnathon took amazing care of us.
Our server Johnathon was great and always checked in to see if we needed anything. Great food, great beer, and great service.
Jonathan was awesome and the food was great!
Jonathon was attentive and friendly and the food was great. The atmosphere was relaxing to eat in and i always have a great time bringing friends or family here.
Great beer food and atmosphere
Cute place to grab a beer. John is a great server. We will keep coming back. Loved the Halloween beer flight

Went for dinner the other night for the first time. My server was a very pleasant young lady named Tori. She was very knowledgeable of the menu and really was patient. I’m incredibly picky so I know I’m a servers worse nightmare lol. They …

Live close and one of our favorite places to go for a few drinks or a sit down meal. Had Johnathan as our server and he was very attentive and knowledgeable also very personable and joked around with us. 10/10 would recommend.
Jonathan was amazing!!!! Very attentive and great service!!!! Absolutely will be back. Even gave me a friendly photo bomb! Haha
Best place for Sunday funday even during the pandemic. Jonathan is the best server ever! Ask for him if you like a great time and perfect service!
The person working behind the bar was rude. Food was ok. The waitress was friendly. Probably won’t return.
Place is ok. Waiter was slow. Food is good. Drinks aren’t bad but they are overpriced.
Friendly staff and good food! I recommend the spinach and artichoke dip, the big boss, and the reuben
Service from tori was fantastic, and beer was great, try the SOL.
Good beer, cool atmosphere

Great atmosphere with good food. Beer is really good (my favorite in Fayetteville) with the All American and Til Valhalla as my favorite. Have a small selection of games to play with friends while hanging out. Small outdoor seating section out front of the restaurant, with great view of Hay Street
Great atmosphere. Great staff. Try the Namaste Lavender Ale!

i came in last night on a date, and my server was Tori. she was awesome! she made some great recommendations and was very knowledgeable about the beer and made a very enjoyable experience. my date, not knowing if you come in, ask for tori!
The food was pretty good, aside from the pizza. The sauce was way to sweet. The kids liked it though. Definitely try the peanut butter whiskey and banana bacon cocktail. Amazing.

They are currently under renovations which is dramatically changing the vibe of the place in a really positive way. It should be great once complete! We recommend trying  a flight of beer before diving into a full one if you're new. Also, highly recommend their nachos. They easily feed both my husband and I!

Love the food. Hamburgers are the best and a unique selection. The salads are always fresh. My husband loves their beers. The staff is friendly and pleasant. The owners are always working to find out better ways to serve their customers. Our go to place to get a delicious meal.
Their food is amazing and their staff is very friendly. I'm definitely going to recommend anyone to try them out.
It's always good!

Today was my first time going there and I ordered the cauliflower bites.  The seasoning on them was good but overall, they were very greasy. I don't know if I will be going back to give it a second try.
Great little brewery and restaurant doing food to go and filling up 64 oz growlers.
Great better selection! Food is great but maybe a little salty

Great brewery, and excellent service from Tori. She was very personable and knowledgeable about the beer on tap, and offered great recommendations for food. My husband took her recommendation of the Reuben with sweet fries and I took her …

We were in town for a conference and stumbled upon this GREAT place !!!  The Wings, Brats and Nachos were delicious...and so was the beer.  The highlight of our visit was the outstanding service.  Our server (Ryan Hebl) was knowledgeable, …
Great atmosphere, great service, great food.
Fantastic experience and delicious beer! Ryan is the best!!!!

Ryan was fantastic. He had water ready as soon as we sat down, immediately brought our beers and got our order out correctly and quickly. He was super friendly and made great conversation as we hung out. The food was good, and the beer was …

A night stop at charming Hay St., in Fayetteville, NC. Lake Gaston promised to be appealing. The decor is primitive summer camp like. We ordered hummus ($8) and sangria ($7) for appetizer. The pita bread was a bit over cooked and showed …

I had a GREAT experience! Tori was my server and she was absolutely amazing! She was very personable and has outstanding customer service! Tori recommended the cauliflower bites and they were delicious! I will absolutely come back!!

Friendly staff but mediocre food and beverage service for Fayetteville. Ordered a Gaston Burger by server recommendation which comes with a 100%  "Angus" meat patty. When the burger was delivered to our table it  was dry and overcooked. The …

Anytime we visit another state, we always try to find a brewery. And this time we tried Lake Gaston Brewing Co. in Fayetteville, NC. It had a menu of about twelve brews, more or less. We sampled the ones we thought were interesting. But …
Outstanding food and service. You must try the Cauliflower! Tori did a great job serving us, and we hope to be back again soon!
Good food, great service and nice atmosphere. Just a little pricey, otherwise a nice place.
Amazing appetizers! I highly recommend the cauliflower bites with ranch dressing.
Fun environment, clean for the whole family. Friendly employees coupled with good food.

Our first time eating at Lake Gaston Brewing Co. and we wish we would've come here a long time ago. First...Ryan, our server, was AMAZING!!! His knowledge of the menu allowed him to make recommendations that were spot on for us! We …

Great local brewery.  I always tell people to support local companies for the local economy.  Don't put all your money in the CEO's pocket and support these small businesses that treat their employees with respect and pay what should be …
The gold digger is pretty good... so is the fried cauliflower. The atmosphere is warm and friendly.
Awesome beer and food. Friendly environment! Best bartender ever!!! Mari was so accommodating! Definitely a place to visit!

Brooke is hands down the best server I’ve ever experienced! She was there when we needed her and not hovering over us when we didn’t. If I had one wish, it would be that every waitress I encountered in every bar from this moment forward, …

My wife and I stopped in yesterday for lunch, great food and outstanding service! The food was cooked perfectly, great quality and price. Our server, Will, was great! “Where there’s a will, there’s a way” we’ll definitely be back.
Had a great time , watching baseball good food and beer, my server Will was on point my food was on time hot my beer was cold , overall a perfect dining experience definitely coming back.

Great restaurant! The first time we had Will as our server then we had Ashley the next time. Both visits we were impressed with the friendly service and excellent food (and beer). We will definitely visit again soon.
Lovely staff gr8 beer 5 star service.
Great service, good beer and food!
Great food, and amazing drinks.
Great atmosphere

My husband and I had such a great experience here with our dog, Penny. I had adult chicken fingers and my husband ordered the mac daddy (I think it was called) topped with grilled chicken and they were both amazing. We’ve eaten here before …
Amazing service and great food!! Tori is the best!!
This place is inviting.. Mari made us feel at home. We had a great conversation and absolutely loved the vibes! Highly recommend

Love it! So good to see the downtown get a good brewery. I had the roasted cauliflower with Thai chili sauce and it was great. Nice outside seating. Amalia was super attentive and knew the menu very well. Good food and GREAT beer.
This was not what me and my sister except the chicken was terrible very hard any other food don't know we was not satisfied at all so we did not tip need

Such an amazing local bar! Mari was one of the best bartenders I have had, very personably and amazing... showed us different samples of the beer to allow us to try everything  they offered (Went with the Cream Ale) then after that she made one of the best shots I’ve ever had. Great service, and clean facility.

This was my 3rd time eating at Lake Gaston Brewing Co. this time I had the pleasure of having Tori as my server. She recommended the cauliflower bites, which were bomb, honestly she was the best server I've had there thus far, not to mention she resembles Kristen Stewart. Ask for her by name, she goes by either Tori or Bella!
Our waitress Kelsie was a really nice. We got our food and everything we needed right away. The beers here are really good. I prefer the pale ale.

Me and my family visited this restaurant on a lazy summer afternoon and had a great experience. Great beer selection and yummy food.. do try the cauliflower bites with couple of different toppings .. our plates were wiped clean! Our server …
Great vibe at this place.... Cheese curds are life changing!
Cute little place.  Enjoyed the sun  while we ate.   1st time. Enjoyed the food.  Service was great😊.  We'll be back soon ❤
LOVE the Guest Cider!
This is our favorite place to go downtown! Bjorn is such a great server!! If you ever go, request him, and your visit will be the best every time!
I had a great experience the food was delicious the sangria was really good and our waiter Bjorn was amazing, he was very pleasant very tentative and great attitude.
Kaley is the best server in the world. The kitchen is awesome too, quick to make food and always deliciousl. Best brewery in fayetteville.
Our waitress Tori was awesome! Super fast, friendly, and kept checking to make sure we had everything we needed! Really sweet lady. Great menu and awesome beers. Definitely gonna go back.
We came in this afternoon and the food was delicious the Gaston burger recommended by our server Bjorn was  great,  great service!

This is my second year in a row celebrating my birthday here. I enjoy the vibe and the drinks! This experience was extra special because I had an amazing and kind waiter named Will! He is absolutely amazing, professional and kind. I have …

Great service, horrible food. I’m thinking we hit an off day for the kitchen or something based on past reviews. Even though the food was cold, wrong, bland, and flavorless the service was phenomenal. I may try them again, if they don’t close down like every other outfit in this location. We’ll see.
Good beers, good times, fair prices.  Bjorn always does a great job when we visit.  Definitely recommend.
The avocado fries were so good I usually hate warm avocado but they were good in the Thai chili!  The cauliflower bites were also very good. Bjorn was our server and was super sweet and attentive!

Stopped in yesterday, passing through Fayetteville after google recommendation. We had Tori as our server and she was excellent. Being from out of the state, she left us with a great impression. The food was delicious, and she offered great …
Great food and beer with a good overall environment.
Great atmosphere ....the food was fantastic .....beer was great service was excellent and fast...we would love to return from Asheville NC!
My mom and I went to lake Gaston yesterday night  and had a great time. They have lots of free games and good food our waiter Bjorn was really nice and quick 10/10!!
Great service. Pretty good tacos. Bjorn is the man

Stopped in this weekend, ordered the gaston burger and sweet potato fries. Wasn't sure the beer I wanted but my waitress Kaley pointed me in the direction of her favoritre, which was the strawberry blonde. Beer, food, and waitress was great. Definitely will be back
We had Tori as our server and she was beyond great; she knew about everything on the menu and was polite and helpful.
Our server Tori was extremely helpful and gave us great recommendations! The food was awesome and I would recommend it to anyone.

our waiter bjorn, was friendly, fast, and provided great service all-around. He provided great suggestions for our drinks. The food was amazing, and the drinks were awesome. My fiance and I will definitely be coming back.

Great experience here, service was quick and the food was great! I highly recommend this location, they've done a fantastic job of building the location up over the last few months. Bjorn was the best!
Bjorn was an excellent server. He was quick with all of our needs and the food was delicious!

This place is awesome. The food is fantastic. I would say try the bratwurst. It's the best I have ever had. The service is the best I have ever had. Jonathan our server was so amazing I would ask for him by name.

Dont go there, the service was awful, 1st the order was all wrong, then the food was overcooked, I had the paper that's between the cheese patties still on my sandwich. It was just awful from start to finish. Stay away

Tonight was our first experience at the Lake Gaston Brewing Company!!  Great food, great atmosphere and great service!!   Our waiter, Will, was the very best waiter ever!!   He was friendly, very attentive and wore a smile that did not …
Awesome experience. Jonathan was awesome with information,service and had great energy! Highly recommend and will be back!
Jonathan was great! He was very sweet and very helpful when I asked questions about the different drinks they offered. The atmosphere was awesome as well! We will be back! :)
Good food! Even got a card trick done at our table! Shout out to Will! Great service
Great Experience!  Extremely friendly staff and great beer.  We will definitely be returning.
Will was awesome! Food was great but his service is the reason I'm coming back! Thanks for the great time!
Good food, fun environment. My kids loved it. Also the pressed porter is outstanding!
Great beer, excellent appetizers, super friendly staff.

Great experience! Going to the top breweries in NC and this is one of the best that I’ve been. Great service by Will (highly recommend him). Great atmosphere, great bear, great food and great times. Will recommend this place to everybody. Come by and chill with the best brewery in Fayetteville!!
If you haven’t been here you have to go! Ask for Will! He will make your day or night! Amazing beer, drinks, food, and service! Will definitely come back!!

WILL was absolutely the best waiter I've ever had.... EVER. I gave the restaurant a 4 star but Will is a 10!! His attitude and energy were everything.. his service was amazing, and he kept us entertained!!!
Will is an incredible waiter. We had on phenomenal service, great convo and even a little entertainment. We’re in town from Dallas, TX and he’s been nothing less than welcoming and hospitable!

I came here with a few friends on Saturday and we sat on the front patio. Our server was Tori she looked just like the actress from twilight! I jokingly asked for he autograph, and she was really funny and knowledgeable. The beer was …
First time here, and we loved it! Will waited on us and was awesome! Good food, good beer, and good service!

Food was okay, nothing special. Beer was also okay. Best part was Johnathan our server. Place was packed and he noticed we weren’t getting food/drinks and came over and took awesome care of us. Cute little location and cozy vibes. I’d say check it out.

I really wanted to go eat and have a drink here and I know I came in a little late(about 10 minutes before “closing”). I was told “we will have to see if we can still serve you. The waitress although sweet said “oh we can serve you most of …

I was just strolling through Hay street one Sunday and stumbled across this super chill spot. Will, the waiter was just adorable and incredibly sweet, recommended the cauliflower bites and some pretty awesome drafts. Definitely a good place to come grab a bite and a beer and enjoy the summer weather. I’ll def be back!
Great vibes, friendly staff, fantastic beer, board games and cards... if you visit Fayetteville it is worth swinging by. Also Chef Theo Gums came out and talked to me and my wife. Very cool.

I'd do 2.5 stars if possible. I cant comment on the beer, as nothing on the beer menu sounded worth trying. However, the I can comment on the food. A bit dissapointed when the brats and pretzel bites came out tasting very bland and lacking …
Loved the place great beer nice atmosphere great service go if your downtown!
Will is the best server I have had. Service was always punctual and professional!!!! Go will!!!!
Will was the bee's knees. Definitely will be coming back .
Excellent service! Our waitress was attentive and very personable.  The fish and chips were the best I've had in town - not too much batter and seasoned just right. The fries were also delicious!

Super friendly staff and good food served really fast if you only have 45 minutes to eat and get back to work! Jonathan was my server and he couldn't have been sweeter nor more attentive. Everyone seemed to get along greatly! I strongly recommend it!
Beer and food are great. Service not so much. Tried 3 times. Why? I guess I was hoping for improvement. Shame on me. Won't be coming back.

Good beer, horrible service. Unfortunate, would really love to come back for the beer but no way I could put myself through it again.  However, if you have a free 2 hours, order a burger and cross your fingers. I never got mine and left …
Friendly spot. Had a really good burger here, and a nice beer. Cool location. Service is amazing! I'd like to see a hazy ipa done here at some point but their beer is unique and very tasty.
When there's a Will, there's a way. Will is awesome. Exceeded our expectations. Brews were delicious.
Service is typically great. The place has a nice atmosphere. Feels similar to a cafe in Chicago I loved.
Awesome beer, great food and excellent service. We love it here!
The food is great. Many ways to keep people entertained.
I look forward to a return trip. The bill won't shock you.
The pretzel and bratwurst appetizer was delicious and they're drink menu is great. Will is an amazing waiter and even does magic tricks!

Edited: returned after an awesome response and gave it another try. Food is AMAZING as usual. Beer selection is awesome, I highly recommend the Sandy Sunrise: beer meets cider. The Pressed Poter was ok, a little flat, but still good. We had …

I was in with my wife today, I ordered the Gaston burger and my wife ordered the Jerk Chicken sandwich. My burger was delicious, however my wife’s jerk sandwich was cold as if it had been sitting a little while, as it did take about 30 …
Food could be cooked a bit longer and more flavor..
Good meals and beer choices. Staff is great too.
Pleasant atmosphere.
The bartender Susan was Amazing.

Nice environment and fun board games. The food was pretty good and service was fast even though it was moderately busy. We were served by Will, he was super nice and gave great recommendations for our meal.

I visited this brewery with my wife while passing through NC last weekend after a recommendation your servers Tori, during a film festival. I was very impressed with the beer selection, my favorite was the gold digger, and although the …

Horrible food and hours. 930 Saturday night and I have to hurry because they close soon. Downtown, 200k people and they close early! Bartender is rude, I'm literally sitting here now. Will not be back. Horrible.
Two words: CAULIFLOWER BITES!!!! OMG and don’t get me started on their Mango Jabanero sauce..the rest of the menu is awesome...our server Will is awesome

SO AMAZING!! The cauliflower bites were to die for. So delicious. Absolutely recommend coming here for those alone. The burgers are fresh and super tasty as well. Great atmosphere. All around 100% must try.

Today I decided to try out lake Gaston. The drinks are great and the building is spacious for downtown Fayetteville. However, the best part was the service we received from Tori. She always managed to come by just as we needed a refresher …
Very nice and pleasant.

We were downtown this afternoon for business, and decided to have lunch at Lake Gastin Brewing Co.  I'm so glad we did!!! The St. Paddy's Day entertainment was awesome!! Our server Will was so hospitable and very helpful explaining menu items.  We will definitely be visiting again soon!
Awesome food, will was an excellent server
If you like craft beers, this place is great. The food is average here. The atmosphere is always fun though. We went for karaoke night recently and had a blast and our service was phenomenal!
Food was pretty good & prices weren't bad either.... If you like fries, you may want to ask for "Crispy"  otherwise, they're pretty soggy..... Hummus was yummy 😋 & wings were TOO👍😀
Johnathan is the word. Rock on homie. Hope you get that free meal. Lol but no I love the wit'l friend it's my favorite beer like out of all the beers!
Jonathon’s service was 🔥🔥🔥
Jonathan is the best server and this place has good beer and cocktails 👌
Our server, Will, provided amazing service! The food was exceptional! The local brews are super tasty!
Will is amazing! Sit in his section and he will take care of you! Great time at Lake Gaston today!

Really great place to sit down, take a break, and eat at! The food was amazing. I had the blueberry salad with balsamic vinegar and it was heavenly. Wait time was short and the waiter was very nice! All the beer was made in-store and tasted great!
Johnathon was hands down the best server, highly recommend him
Good food and good beer! I like that they have board games and card games to play also
The food isn’t very good and the pricing is a bit off. We’ve given this place multiple chances and we want to like it but we won’t be going back any time soon.

Good to very good beer. Nice roomy atmosphere, and excellent service. The bartender was awesome, and a Brewer came out to visit and talk beer with me. Even the server who just started there was friendly. I'm hoping to return to try the food.
You may find sometimes the service is a little slow, but I enjoy it, they are courteous well-mannered and very helpful.  I will eat here many times in the future.

The atmosphere and the music bingo was what would make this place stand out. Not trying to sound like a downer but I didnt care much for the thai chili wings, barely had any sauce on them. However the bison sliders were on point! Definitely recommend them, I almost ordered 2 orders but wouldn't have room in my stomach for it

Had a salad here that rocked my world. Waitress was a bit off, and they left the avocado off my 6$ salad, only I didn't notice the lack of avocado until I was 3/4 the way through it. It was actually very very good, even without the avacado.
Had dinner on the patio, great vibe. My boyfriend loved his burger and the craft beer selection. We will be back.
Best craft brew in town. Owned by a veteran of the Pineland Republic conflict.
Food was ok, beer was decent, but the service was terrible.
Great burgers and delicious craft beer. Service was very friendly. Weekly events such as trivia/ bingo and karaoke are held.

First time going last night. Couldn't have picked a better night...... karaoke night! Their first one. AMAZE-BALLS!!!! The service was good, the food was good. Amanda was a great waitress, friendly, attentative. We mos def will be back. Hope this place continues to be successful and MORE KARAOKE!!!
Great environment, even better food. If you go, request Kaylee as server, she is very attentive and overall a great waitress. 10/10 experience

Great service, poor over priced food. Ordered three different appetizers to share with the family. Cheese Curds are so under cooked that the wet batter was sloughing off.  Fried Cauliflower was prepackaged and a let down. Pretzel Bites & …

This place is awesome.  My wife and I were struggling to find a good place to eat while on a road trip from Maine to Florida. I prefer a restaurant that has good food and good beer, and this place was just that. It's in an awesome setting …
I love this place! The music is perfection, the wait staff is excellent! I recommend highly.

Decent beer, disappointing food. Fish taco had a very small flecks of fish, replacement and original tacos had a oddly stale shell, fries were grease soaked and not crisp (like oil wasnt hot enough), burger was not cooked to order (they …

We went there on Sunday night and had some burgers, the staff is awesome and the burgers were really good. Awesome beer too. Our waitress Amanda was super nice and funny and took great care of us. We have been going there occasionally for …

Nice afternoon to day drink! Tried all of the beers, in flights. Favorite was mixing the dew drop lavender ale and the original sin black widow...half and half! Was awesome! Portside porter was the second fav! Servise was awesome!
Fabulous joint great hosts
Phenomenal
Very slow service, everyone working was very nice but extremely slow. Beer was, eh. Didn't get food.

Not a pleasant experience. The wait staff seemed to have trouble remembering guest orders. Servers asked several tables, simultaneously, who ordered meals that were brought out. I personally waited for twenty minutes for a refill on tea, as …

A very cool little place to grab a bite and have a beer indoor seating or outdoor seating whichever is your choice. A wide variety of beer choices with a great friendly staff. TVs to view your football or basketball or baseball games. Easy vibe with a laid-back atmosphere. I'll definitely going back to sit on the patio and have a cold
Great food, good service! Prices are very reasonable and the atmosphere is top notch. First visit was awesome!

I had a wonderful experience at Lake Gaston Brewing!! The service is great and the food was fantastic. The owners are very kind and I love how they are on hand to talk to customers. They have a great variety of beers as well so everyone should be able to find something that they like. I will definitely be back!
This place is really good !!! A+ ,  Really Good Food, and Amazing Craft Beers !!! Highly recommended !!!

We decided to have a date here just my husband and I and we were so impressed! Nate was our server and he was attentive but not annoying. We are burger people and feel these were the best burgers in Fayetteville, hands down. I even got to …
The food was excellent and not terribly expensive. The beer was just OK, nothing special. Not a great selection of either.
Great food. Quality food. Micro brews!  Trendy and cozy.

I'm a minor, so I can't say anything about the alcohol, but my friends love it. The burgers are delicious, and I love the amount of options they have for their menu items. You can choose to have a veggie patty or chicken instead of a beef patty for all of their burgers, so very vegetarian friendly.
Ate here for supper. Waitress was wonderful and sweet. Everything we ordered was absolutely delicious, salad, bratwurst, loaded fries, everything was fabulous!! Cannot wait to come back again!!
The beer brat and pretzel plate is amazing! Get it with the Boondocker IPA. The  service is always great and it's our favorite place to eat!
Great place

I just had one of the best drinks I've had in Fayetteville at Lake Gaston Brewing Co. We didn't have any food, drinks only. Cocktail/wine menu has something for most everyone. I'm not a beer drinker but my husband enjoyed his beer - …

Ate there Saturday night.  Really good beers and very good food.  Nothing fancy, but really tasty and we'll done.  Only had the Lake Gaston brews and all of them were excellent- very smooth and well balanced.  Most importantly the service …
Best burger in Fayetteville! Mary, our server, was so polite and attentive. What a pleasant experience. We will be back!!!!

Beer was very well done. Flights of 4 beers are $10; worth trying for sure. Food was good. Both the whiskey burger and lamb sliders were very tasty. Kids have the option of flat bread pizza or burger sliders. I think they could create a …
Always a friendly relaxing atmosphere, great beers and food.
This place has the best Whiskey burger and Black and Blue burger in town. Also, they brew delicious beers. My favorites are the All American Strong Ale and the Boondocker IPA.
Excelent place. Good food, outstanding attention.
BEST pretzel and beer cheese I've ever had. Will return for that alone, plus they have a good selection of beers
We love their food and their beers! So far we have enjoyed every visit! Highly recommend them.
username: Juan and Sierra G Tube Vlogs

caption: Great food, great beer, and they brought out treats and ice water for our dog! What more can you ask for? Gabby is a wonderful server.. friendly, quick, and attentive. Definitely check this place out.
Love the atmosphere, but most of all love Elite Catering, Chef Lou and Edna catering manager
Had to try their award winning Lavendar Ale! Very smooth. Awesome job you guys!

The food was delicious and plated nicely, and the prices are fair for a downtown Fayetteville restaurant. I loved that they have games you can play while you wait for your food. This is a great place to stop and eat lunch with friends …

This used to be a different brew pub under a different name. What an incredible transformation!! The beer is really good.. I tried their IPA and Dunkle which were both spot on. The food is really good as well, try the Mahi Mahi tacos, you won't be disappointed. You also get entertainment people watching on Hay Street!

I absolutely love this place! It took me a while to find it, because it's no longer Horne's, although it says that upfront (historic building) so keep an eye open for that. I love all of their craft beers, and so far my favorite meal is the …
The Whiskey Burger is my favorite!! Great food and drinks and great atmosphere!!
Had an awesome time at Lake Gastom...
The food was amazing and the service exceeded expectations. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great burger and beer.
Awesome place to have a beer and catch up with good friends. Not to mention the food, the Tacos de Carnitas are the best!!
The buffalo cauliflower is amazing, rest of the food was just okay. Service was sub-par.
Great environment and great food! Staff was super friendly!!!
Wonderful environment, people, food and selection of beer. I would highly recommend this establishment.

Stopped in for a late lunch during the Dog Wood Festival. Service was very good (fast & friendly). All the beers I tried were good.  The pretzel and beer cheese was good. I would have given it 5 stars except the fish tacos were over cooked, fish was very dry, and they need more of the sauce to give them more flavor.

Dissappointed today. They took 45 minutes to make our food, when the restaraunt was practically empty. Our waitress was nice , but was forgetting alot of things we would ask her. They forgot some ingredients in one of my daughters omelette. …
Great food, great service and decent prices. What more can I say?

My wife and I stopped in for a couple of pints. The beer was good but the bartender was not at all friendly or engaging. Her demeaner was transactional and we didn't enjoy our visit and didn't stay long. The lead bartender is the face of …
Good Cuban sandwich and burger. Fries a little too greasy. Waitress very attentive.
We ordered cheeseburgers on St Patrick's day.   It was wide open aft the brewery, but the food was still delicious and prompt
Best beer and atmosphere in Fayetteville hands down.

Good beer relaxed atmosphere. Service seemed hit or miss

I really wanted to like this place. However, it took about 10 min for a server to come and take our drink orders and then they were out of the two beers I wanted to try. I understand they just started opening for lunch so they might not …

Marcie (unsure of spelling) was a terrific waitress. She was very helpful in offering suggestions and was attentive. The food was tasty and not overpriced. The beer was the best part, of course. We enjoyed our experience thoroughly and will go back.
Such a cool place! The weather was great so we sat outside on the patio and had great service! The beer was delicious!
Great craft brews, food is awesome and really good service
Service was good, burger was good, fries were okay, but Husband had the lamb sliders last night and woke up at 5 am really really sick to his stomach.
Very nice people who love what they do
Every brew we tried was phenomenal. If you enjoy craft brews this is a must stop and try. Remember everyones taste buds arr different but to us it was top notch! Drink and Enjoy!
Great beer and amazing service. Definitely a great addition to Downtown Fayetteville.
Its delicious, they have an choices for vegetarians, great service always' and great food and beer. Very recommended.
Great food and excellent craft beers. Super friendly service
This type of place is exactly what downtown Fayetteville needs
Spinach artichoke was outstanding as well as the mahi mahi tacos.  Beer was good also 👍🏻

I went during the Zombie Walk and the place was busy. However, it took about 10 minutes for the waitress to come over to get our drink order,  which I think she was distracted with all that was going on because she brought the wrong beer. I …

Amazing craft beer and food.  Lake Gaston Brewery is NOT Airborne Brew even though Google has linked them together.  They offer gourmet, fresh food that compliments their craft beer menu options. Their inhouse freshly made brats and fresh …
Food was great beer was better!  Amazing service. Loved that the owner took a minute to ask us how we were doing. Perfect place to chill and have a beer
They are no long the Airborne brewery and are now under a new brewery. Their beer is excellent and the waitress was very nice. They have a good food selection as well.

Under new ownership, good guys just starting iut. The accommodated us even though we had reserved a room with the privous occupant. Give them a little time to work out the details. They seem like they know what to do. I'll be back to see how it goes in the weeks to come.
tried to check them out. doors were locked at 8:40pm

Great Location, love that they are in Downtown Fayetteville! Awesome beer and and munchies!
